verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:15
verses.text: But Jeshurun waxed fat, and kicked: thou art waxen fat, thou art grown thick, thou art covered with fatness; then he forsook God which made him, and lightly esteemed the Rock of his salvation.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:16
verses.text: They provoked him to jealousy with strange gods, with abominations provoked they him to anger.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:17
verses.text: They sacrificed unto devils, not to God; to gods whom they knew not, to new gods that came newly up, whom your fathers feared not.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:18
verses.text: Of the Rock that begat thee thou art unmindful, and hast forgotten God that formed thee.
